channel.title: Tyden F2P 06 - Reliving the F2P memorys
channel.description:
[B][CENTER]Tyden F2P 06 (I'll make logo later lol) [size=14pt]Temporary Website: [URL=http://tyden-f2p.ucoz.net/]Tyden Home[/URL][/size] [IMG]http://i3.lulzimg.com/a67f6926d0.png[/img] [url=http://"www.youtube.com/user/Tyden06F2P]http://"www.youtube.com/user/Tyden06F2P[/url] [/CENTER]
[U]June 24 2012[/U] - Downloaded clean delta - Credits to lostmyphat Other updates I forgot lol until i worked on it on july 4 again [U]LATEST UPDATE[/U] Tutorial island [U]July 3 2012[/U] Added/Made: - Music regions - Quick songs(Death music) - Dialogue - tutorial island base Other things: - Added magic spells, tweaked combat just a bit - Removed Newbie Melody. It crashes the client o.O - Added other things that is too much to talk about l0l [U]July 2 2012[/U] - Added sound and music to the client and server - Added camera packets - Added shops and changed npcspawns - Added a bunch of admin tools for testing skills - Made all members items into members object
[img]http://i.imgur.com/2EJAV.gif[/img] [U]Melee[/U] ["Melee Info/Media"] - Tweaked the original delta combat system. - Max hit forumulas are 90% correct - Equipment requirements are complete [img]http://i.imgur.com/C2xH2.gif[/img] [U]Range[/U] ["Range Info/Media"] - Ranging requirements - All bows & arrows [img]http://i.imgur.com/HhYtx.gif[/img] [U]"]Magic[/U] ["Magic Info/Media"] - Low/High alching work - Magic requirements - All f2p modern spells [img]http://i.imgur.com/t0SHW.gif[/img] "][U]Prayer[/U] [img]http://i.imgur.com/4Ou9K.gif[/img] [U]Mining[/U] ["Mining Info/Media"] - Random valuables when mining - Examine works - Requirements [img]http://i.imgur.com/Bbq6R.gif[/img] [U]Smithing[/U] ["Smithing Info/Media"] - Only smithing is done. - Smelting does not WORK [img]http://i.imgur.com/QrNzk.gif[/img] [U]Woodcutting[/U] ["Woodcutting Info/Media"] - Stumps - Axe requirements - Video coming soon - All trees [img]http://i.imgur.com/0HOQK.gif[/img] [U]Firemaking[/U] ["Firemaking Info/Media"] - Clipping - All logs - vid coming soon [img]http://i.imgur.com/5zdcP.gif[/img] [U]Crafting[/U] ["Crafting Info/Media"] - All leathers that are f2p - Tanner(yay) - buggy [img]http://i.imgur.com/HFOC2.gif[/img] [U]Fishing[/U] ["Fishing Info/Media"] - 100% Working formulas. [img]http://i.imgur.com/Xvfj1.gif[/img] [U]Cooking[/U] ["Cooking Info/Media"] - Worked on. [img]http://i.imgur.com/bUmTj.gif[/img] [U]Runecrafting[/U] ["Runecrafting Info/Media"] - at 99 runecraft, you can craft 270 air runes from a full inv of rune essence - Multiplier [img]http://i.imgur.com/R4MMI.png[/img] [U]Music/Sounds[/U] ["Music/Sounds Info"] - Music regions - Quick Songs - Music system - Sound system Vid: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IdVPogZ2q3s]Tyden F2P 06 Remake - Music System - YouTube[/url] [U]Quests[/U] ["Quests Info"] - Cook's assistant - Witch's potion Tutorial Island: -RuneScape Instructor -Fishing/Woodcutting/Firemaking Instructor -Cooking instructor -Quest instructor -Mining/Smithing instructor -Combat instructor -Money instructor -Prayer instructor -Magic instructor -Correct hint arrows -Doors "Credits"]Credits: lostmyphat - Clean ass delta vault - for most of the layout lolz Hopefully this remake won't die like many others have. I kinda rushed this layout but w/e. MEDIA: [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bSDlu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/skLUY.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/erTK2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/68lE9.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XI4BR.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1nSqc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/N0JvO.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Hd0UB.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/4f6pb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wtF4R.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fvL3w.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/T4VvM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/skedr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0Pc46.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xxspn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BILSr.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ajVsM.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jlo68.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ma5sJ.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SypGG.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Qzusb.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/XPC0M.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/M4Jqe.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wvCjF.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dZN5a.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/anyaO.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8ApcX.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9iqRp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iL2oz.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ln8Cu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Ybjot.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/N4rFj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tp8gC.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/sCzkn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/MAQCB.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jIaOZ.png[/img]

item.title: Tyden F2P 06 - Reliving the F2P memorys
item.dc:creator: @latifundio latifundio
item.description:
@latifundio wrote:

darkside1222:

The only major bug was just npc clipping but thats all and its partially fixed anyways

yea its a lot better but i still think run energy goes away to fast

Read full topic
item.source: Tyden F2P 06 - Reliving the F2P memorys

item.title: Tyden F2P 06 - Reliving the F2P memorys
item.dc:creator: @darkside1222 darkside1222
item.description:
@darkside1222 wrote:

[quote=“mr extremez, post:110, topic:448106”][quote author=darkside1222 link=topic=551000.msg4090242#msg4090242 date=1346263311]
Bump : server is on a vps now! http://tyden-f2p.ucoz.net/

Anyways, the website right now is only temp. We will be getting a 06 website very soon guys

A LOT of bugs have been fixed ingame. Trading, combat, skills etc. Most of them had a lot of bugs but now they are mostly all fixed.

I’m currently working on a webclient fix right now so please wait guys! If you can’t wait just download the client
[/quote]Why did you have so many bugs in the first place :|[/quote]

The bugs were things that i didn’t think of

Most of the bugs were MINOR bugs and they really didn’t affect gameplay as much. The only major bug was just npc clipping but thats all and its partially fixed anyways

Read full topic

item.title: Tyden F2P 06 - Reliving the F2P memorys
item.dc:creator: @darkside1222 darkside1222
item.description:
@darkside1222 wrote:

Firemaking - F2P Remake 06 Tyden - YouTube

Firemaking video has been uploaded. I rushed on recording it =/. Not much to show anymore. I’m not going to make as much videos because this will be up soon anyways.

I forgot to show level requirements and clipping. They both work 100%

Other updates

  • Bank pins has been added with correct banker dialogues
  • Bankers can now be talked to. You couldn’t talk to them because of the bank booth in the way lol
  • Magic sounds has been added(Not all)
  • Fixed the weird dark blue water color o.O
  • You can now remove your bank pin
  • You can also change ur bank pin via bankers

I need to remove the “Your pin will be deleted blah” thing

Updates

  • Pottery has been completely finished.
  • Fixed a combat issue
  • Fixed the ban handler.
  • Entity-Based combat has been scrapped =/ Its wayy to weird and hard now lol
  • Npcs now attack back when they are attacked while they are walking back to their respawn point
  • Cleaned more members shiet.

zS3Zl.png760×497

UMrCO.png763×499

6RG72.png761×499

Gl8pC.png761×501

Read full topic

item.title: Tyden F2P 06 - Reliving the F2P memorys
item.dc:creator: @darkside1222 darkside1222
item.description:
@darkside1222 wrote:

fWelj.png762×499

M2z0p.png761×500

cx50M.png763×498

6BI6Q.png764×499

UPDATES

  • Few basic contents have been added/finished such as a few gates, axe in log, and haybales.

  • Magic sprites now outline properly without any bugs.

  • Temp removed the welcome screen due to major bugs.

  • Attempting to rewrite parts of the combat system to become Entity based. Success so far NPC vs NPC is entity based atm.

  • Readded mime event.

  • Whirlpool bugs has been fixed

  • Mining Guild has been added.

  • Added a sound system that handles all sounds(global,player,npc)

  • Added timer so you cannot mass click on objects

More updates, but i forgot them =/

Read full topic
